text: The Charles Anderson School is a non-boarding government combined school in the Oshana Region of Namibia founded in 1999 and situated in Ongwediva. Graduates frequently occupy the national Grade 10 top ten. The building of the school was funded by the Swedish government. The school is named after Charles John Anderson. The school teaches about 800 students from grade 1 to grade 10. Category:Schools in Namibia Category:1999 establishments in Namibia
title: Charles Anderson School
